about_the_game:
Snowfallen Survivors Chest
The nights grow colder, as the winter spirit emanates from our survivors. Sing loud and sing bright, throughout the dark night, donning the apparel of a frigid caroler.

Happy Winter's Feast!

Includes
  • Wilson's Snowfallen Skin Set
  • Willow's Snowfallen Skin Set
  • Wolfgang's Snowfallen Skin Set
  • Wendy's Snowfallen Skin Set
  • Webber's Snowfallen Skin Set
  • Wickerbottom's Snowfallen Skin Set

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
